Those are Some Mighty Big Feet

Redefing a “shoestring” budget

Geekwire really played fast and loose with the word “bootstrapping” today applying it to eco-product retailer Greencupboards.

If $288,000 is shoestring, it’s safe to say those are shoes you could be murdered over.
